entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 19. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 35 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:19 AM MST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:19 AM MST Friday 10 February 2023
